newsitem.title: INDONESIA: Indonesian bus driver gets 18 years after 31 die.
newsitem.headline: Indonesian bus driver gets 18 years after 31 die.

text.p: An Indonesian bus driver was jailed for 18 years on Thursday after 31 people died in a highway accident in which his bus slammed into a car last March, the official Antara news agency said.
Antara said Agus Arifin, 39, was sentenced to a term three years above that for deliberately killing a person because he also broke traffic rules and did not help his passengers.
Twenty-nine passengers died, trapped inside the inter-city bus, which burst into flames after hitting the car near Bogor, West Java, on March 23. Two people died in the car.
The three-judge panel said they had imposed a heavy sentence as a warning to drivers of public vehicles to drive carefully.
